title: WATCH | Cheeky Sabi Sabi elephant grazes on tree from resort roof
text:
YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE {{item.title}}

Forget about a cat on a hot tin roof - why not try an elephant for size? And no, your eyes are not deceiving you – there is indeed an elephant bull on this roof.

Kevan Dobbie, a ranger at the Sabi Sabi Earth Lodge (a private game reserve) captured the moment on his phone, initially October 2018.

The lodge is situated in the Sabi Sand Reserve, close to the Kruger National Park - South Africa's flagship park.

Sabi Sand Reserve is well known for spectacular wildlife sightings. This incredible sighting of a leopard kill inside Idube Game Reserve lodge, also in the Sabi Sands Private Game Reserve is a prime example.



Captured by Camz Engelbrecht, a 26-year-old Field Guide on Sunday, 14 October 2018.
